code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCard=_ref=>{let{project}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.mediaUrl,className:"card-img-top",alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text text-muted",children:["by ",project.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:project.technologies.map(tech=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-secondary me-1",children:tech},tech))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-footer d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/project/".concat(project.id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\uD83D\uDC4D ",project.upvotes]})]})]})});};export default ProjectCard;
